channel.title: Moparscpa server status are retarded?
channel.description:
so for the past few server's i hosted, they all lose uptime. Example, im hosting my server, players are logging in and out, everything is good, i check the server status an hour later and im down to 90%. like wtf is this?
Ive been having this problem for ages now, i have perfect connectivity, so wtf is up?

item.title: Moparscpa server status are retarded?
